name: Furious Crash Racing - A Real Car Horizon Chase 3D
name_original: Furious Crash Racing - A Real Car Horizon Chase 3D
description:
Furious crash racing is a trend in these days. You will be amazed after play this mind blowing and stunning racing game. Furious crash racer is an addictive game for crash racing gamers. Drive with fast with furious speed on hill side Mountains feeling the excited car racing. Show your skills and become extreme stunt racer to win this snow hill mountain car crash racing 2017 game. Burn out your car on the hills and crash the opponent cars by hitting them.

Furious Crash Racing is one of the most exciting new generation racer games. Forget all Train Simulator Game, 4x4 Prado Cruiser Game also Subway Train games and Moto Racing Games. Now it is time to do something new to drive your fast furious car and enjoy racing on Snow Mountains. Test your driving skills by hitting cars to collect bonus cash. Test your car driving skills on dangerous hill roads and earn more bonus cash by crash other vehicles for long enjoyment of 3D realistic gameplay and environment with a lot of fun.

Realistic physics, nice graphics and tuned on-screen controls give you great racing experience. Drive more your car through hill snowy track to earn cash by finish the race, with cash you can buy new cars to beat the racing tournament.


TIPS

- Be in a 1st position to get more cash
- Burnout cars by hitting closely to get bonus cash points


Game Features:

- Smoothest gameplay to thrill the race
- Excellent dynamic and realistic HD graphics.
- Hill mountains car racing mania.
- 3 Different controllers – Steering, Tilting, Touch buttons
- Slow motion crash effect
